_description: Four sorrowful things — four lines written in lower margin in William Herebert’s translation of Nicholas Bozon’s Contes moralisés

BLAdd46919.Transcription: vour þynges ȝe ofte ysoethWhareþorou monye onknowe beethvrete boede ByrnnekocWhystle bone and shore Lok
BLAdd46919.Note: Four lines written in lower margin.
BLAdd46919.Editions:
Reimer,  Stephen R. 
             The Works of William Herebert, OFM.
         Toronto: Pontifical Institute of Mediaeval Studies, 1987: 138.
